## Article Content

HOME
PRODUCTS & INVENTORY
Products & Inventory

The articles in this section cover products and inventory, including how to create products, track inventory, and manage purchase orders.

To learn more about products and inventory, watch our on-demand Products & Inventory video.

In this section:
Creating Products
Search & Sort Products
Add Inventory Change
Purchase Orders
FAQ: Products & Inventory
